straskal_renderbug.name: Renderbug
straskal_renderbug.description: Enables various debug drawing capablities during runtime.

is-enabled.name: Enabled
is-enabled.desc: Whether or not the debug renderer is initially enabled.

draw-bbs.name: Draw
draw-bbs.desc: Whether or not to draw bounding boxes.

bb-solids-only.name: Solids only
bb-solids-only.desc: Whether or not to only draw solids.

draw-polys.name: Draw
draw-polys.desc: Whether or not to draw collision polygons.

poly-solids-only.name: Solids only
poly-solids-only.desc: Whether or not to only draw solids.

draw-tilemap-bbs.name: Draw
draw-tilemap-bbs.desc: Whether or not to draw tilemap bounding boxes.

tilemap-bb-color.name: Color
tilemap-bb-color.desc: The color of tilemap bounding boxes.

tilemap-bb-opacity.name: Opacity
tilemap-bb-opacity.desc: The opacity of tilemap bounding boxes.

draw-tilemap-polys.name: Draw
draw-tilemap-polys.desc: Whether or not to draw tilemap collision polygons.

tilemap-poly-color.name: Color
tilemap-poly-color.desc: The color of tilemap collision polygons.

tilemap-poly-opacity.name: Opacity
tilemap-poly-opacity.desc: The opacity of tilemap collision polygons.

draw-los.name: Draw
draw-los.desc: Whether or not to draw bounding boxes.
